channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain, 12th December
item.description:
Recently all the drains in upper park street were unblocked, but now due to heavy rain storms of recent weeks the drain outside Chelt Motor Club is again .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Upper Park Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forgotten signalised traffic sign at the Brooklyn Road Community Centre, 11th December
item.description:
The traffic lights have gone now but the sign was forgotten because it was in the car park can someone let them know

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: City fibre have finished and the footpath is not complete at the end of Kipling Road junction with Brooklyn Road, 11th December
item.description:
Can someone asked them to come back and finish the path. Itâ€™s also pretty scruffy at the edge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole in middle of the road., 10th December
item.description:
Pot hole in the middle of Bishops Drive. Opposite the bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Woodmans Way, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead end sign in Bishops Close., 10th December
item.description:
The dead end sign has turned and isn't facing the junction for Bishops Close. Some people think that they can get through by my house but it's definitely a dead end. Could there be another sign on the other side of the turn too?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Tobyfield Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No turn right sign, 10th December
item.description:
The no turn right sign on the tesco carpark exit has been turned and people are unable to read it. Could a second one be put on the other side of road coming from rhe carpark? It is a dangerous turn when turning right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Tree Community Centre, 24 Church Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large pothole, 10th December
item.description:
Very large pothole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing problem with sinkhole, 10th December
item.description:
This sinkhole was patched up in August. Within days it was sinking again. It is now so bad that when lorries drive over it it sends vibrations through my house. The sinkhole needs to be properly repaired before it causes an accident or does damage to my house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 86 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence down on Goldsmith Road around the Brooklyn Road Community Centre, 10th December
item.description:
I believe this is a borough council matter. Can somebody please come and do some repairs to the fence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Goldsmith Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches hanging, 9th December
item.description:
After the high winds there are a number of tree branches hanging off a tree and could easily fall and hurt someone
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Dorset Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged tree, 9th December
item.description:
Glencairn Park Road, opposite no. 1A (adjacent to turning into Glencairn Court). Large amount of tree debris on footpath - storm damage? Needs clearing away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Abandoned damaged wheelie bin, 9th December
item.description:
Glencairn Park Road, opposite turning into Glencairn Court. Bin missing a wheel - been in same location for many weeks. Clearly abandoned / dumped. Needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned road ahead close sign on Brooklyn Road, 9th December
item.description:
Can someone pick it up please and the sandbag

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 60 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham

item.title: The hedge from Number 70 that overhangs the pavement opposite Longlands Park entrance, 8th December
item.description:
75% of the pavement cannot be used as the hedge is overgrown causing pedestrians to walk on the road. I have seen numerous school children forced into the road as the hedge has been left to overgrow the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Linworth Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: V deep pothole, 8th December
item.description:
Very deep pothole here by the curve in the road

item.title: Tree branch / hedge obstructing road, 7th December
item.description:
